subject: The Nature Of Things
text:
Whether things are rosy
 or things are sad
 All we can do is live
 one day at a time
 It's often been said
 that the grass is greener
 on the other side
 But what of the fellow
 over there.
 Does he feel any better?
 I often sympathize
 with friends
 Who have lost a loved one
 or who are sick.
 Sharing each other's feelings
 is only showing respect.
 We're not called human
 beings for nothing.
 We're set apart from beast
 We know that love is
 part of us
 From cradle to the grave.
 So live your life
 as best you can
 Share feelings with
 your fellow man
 And strive to enjoy
 "One day at a time".
